findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.location: Functions - Ownable.transferOwnership, BasicToken.balanceOf, ERC20Basic.balanceOf, ERC20.allowance, StandardToken.allowance, StandardToken.approve, StandardToken.increaseApproval, StandardToken.decreaseApproval, MintableToken.finishMinting, NAGACoin.mintWithTimeLock
